if (!require("BiocManager"))
    install.packages("BiocManager")
BiocManager::install("GenomicRanges") #to install the package
library(GenomicRanges) #to load into R session
#create an object to store data using GRange constructor with parameters seqnames, ranges, and strand
#example of a code, the metadata is comprised of score and GC information which may not be necessary and differ depending on the data you create,
gr <- GRanges( seqnames = Rle(c("chr1", "chr2", "chr1", "chr3"), c(1, 3, 2, 4)),
    ranges = IRanges(101:110, end = 111:120, names = head(letters, 10)),
    strand = Rle(strand(c("-", "+", "*", "+", "-")), c(1, 2, 2, 3, 2)),
    score = 1:10,
    GC = seq(1, 0, length=10))      #creates a GRanges object with 10 genomic ranges.
